RPY_DYFLOW.LINE: * Populate Data into Package Product Variant Table Control
LOOP AT GT_PCKPRV INTO GS_PCKPRV WITH CONTROL PCKPRV_TABLE_CONTROL.
* Populate Data into Package Service Table Control

* Populate Data into Package Service Table Control

* Populate Data into Package Product Variant Table Control

* Populate Data into Package Service Table Control
